Reviews.Title: Ok, but would not recommend
Reviews.Author: Lillian Hans
Reviews.Content: Difficult software to install, and not a high quality product. Was good that we got it on sale. I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: RYAN TATTERSFIELD
Reviews.Content: The camera takes pictures all right.... Too bad it is impossible to tell what the picture is of. Absolute garbage, not even suitable as a kids toy.

ProductInfo.Features:
3-in-1 Functionality for still, video, and PC/Web use
Ultra compact and sleek design - a great "spy camera."
VGA CMOS sensor
Stores up to 60 photos
Includes software, battery and instruction manual
ProductInfo.Name: Keychain SPY Digital Camera
